channel.title: ansible on SX-Aurora TSUBASA
channel.description: Recent content in ansible on SX-Aurora TSUBASA

item.title: Ansible for Aurora
item.description: NEC provides RPM packages for SX-Aurora. If you feel its intallation is weird or not standard, visit VEOS yum Repository on the Web. Yes, yum repository for SX-Aurora is available! And we have created ansible scripts to setup SX-Aurora using this yum repository. You can setup Aurora by few commands. Instructions Install CentOS7.5. Clone https://github.com/SXAuroraTSUBASAResearch/aurora-ansible. Write inventory file for ansible. Run ansible-playbook -i hosts.yaml -u root -k playbooks/aurora.yaml to install VEOS.
